message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split is fair and benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was a bit one-sided. Let's split things a bit more evenly this time.
Bob, your offer undervalues the declining worth of the money for you. Let's meet in the middle.
Alice, this back-and-forth isn't getting us anywhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at the value.
